title: How to Milk a Cow By Hands | Evening Milking Of Cow By Hand

tasks.task: Starting the tractor and moving to the field
subtasks: Engage the ignition on the tractor
Sit in the driver's seat of the tractor
Adjust the seat and mirrors for舒适性
Engage the brake and clutch pedals
Shift gears manually while moving
steering the tractor to the field

tasks.task: Attaching the plow to the tractor
subtasks: Lower the lifting mechanism to raise the plow
Approach the plow to the rear of the tractor
Connect the drawbar or hydraulics to attach the plow

tasks.task: Operating the plow by driving across the field
subtasks: Maintaining straight or curved paths as needed
Adjusting the plow depth while driving

tasks.task: Removing the plow after finishing the field
subtasks: Reverse the direction to bring the tractor towards the plow
Using the lifting mechanism to raise the plow
Detaching the plow’s drawbar or hydraulics

tasks.task: Stopping the tractor and turning it off
subtasks: Applying the brake to stop the tractor
Turning off the ignition
Exiting the tractor and checking the attachment

tasks.task: Possibly adjusting tractor seat for different tasks
subtasks: Re-positioning the seat to access better
Adjusting the seat cushion or backrest

tasks.task: Engaging the plow for detailed or second passes
subtasks: Slow down the tractor speed for precise adjustments
Using the plow handlebars or levers to make adjustments
Making minor corrections while plowing

tasks.task: Driving the tractor back to the starting point
subtasks: Reversing the tractor and guiding it back
Using mirrors to check rear and sides
Navigating around obstacles or uneven terrain

tasks.task: Ensuring the tractor is parked correctly
subtasks: Choosing a safe place to park the tractor
Aligning the tractor with the entry/exit path
Applying appropriate measures to prevent roll-away, e.g., using blocking
